speedrunnermod.features.blocks_and_items: Obtained from Â§bspeedrunner oresÂ§f that generate around the world, and loot chests.Can be used to craft the Â§bspeedrunner armor, tools and weapons,Â§f and also acts as an Â§liron ingotÂ§rÂ§f in any crafting recipe.

Found in loot chests and from Â§cnether speedrunner ores.Â§f
Crafted using Â§b9 speedrunner ingots,Â§f and also acts as an Â§liron nuggetÂ§rÂ§f in any crafting recipe.

Found in bastion chests and crafted using Â§b9 speedrunner ingots.Â§f
Acts as an Â§liron blockÂ§rÂ§f in all crafting recipes.

A new type of wood, which can be found across Â§lall biomesÂ§r in the Â§loverworld,Â§r as well as in the Â§onewly added biome,Â§r the Â§bÂ§lSpeedrunner's Wasteland.Â§rÂ§f The Â§bspeedrunner woodÂ§f acts like any other type of wood, like being able to be used as a Â§lfuel source,Â§r but it Â§6doesn't burn from fire or lava.

Found Â§6deserts, Â§cbadlands, Â§fand Â§7soul sand valleys,Â§f the Â§3dead speedrunner woodÂ§r acts pretty much like normal wood. Unlike the Â§bspeedrunner wood,Â§f however, it does burn from Â§6fire and lava,Â§f and can only craft normal sticks.

Along with the Â§bspeedrunner boat,Â§r there are now also Â§ccrimsonÂ§r and Â§9warpedÂ§r boats. They can be crafted just like any ordinary boat, and can Â§6ride in lava. Â§f(excluding the Â§3dead speedrunner boatÂ§f).

A rock obtained from the Â§7igneous oresÂ§f that generate throughout the world.
It only has one use: Â§lcrafting obsidian,Â§r that's it.

Similar to the Â§aeye of ender,Â§f but with a different purpose.
Instead of locating the nearest stronghold, it locates the nearest Â§cnether fortress,Â§f or Â§7bastion,Â§f you get to choose which one it locates, just shift + right-click to swap between the two structures.

The Â§deye of annulÂ§f also acts just like an Â§aeye of ender,Â§f but in addition, it tells you the Â§oexact distanceÂ§r of the nearest stronghold, in blocks.
Additionally, if you Â§lshift + right click,Â§r you can teleport Â§odirectlyÂ§r to the nearest Â§lstronghold portal room.

Acts just like an Â§aeye of ender,Â§f but only locates overworld structures, including Â§6villages,Â§f Â§druined portals,Â§f Â§eshipwrecks,Â§f Â§9ocean monuments,Â§f Â§6woodland mansionsÂ§f and Â§6desert temples.

A Â§overy overpoweredÂ§r and useful item for Â§bspeedrunning.Â§f
Upon right-clicking Â§o(in the end),Â§r you can Â§lforceÂ§r the Â§dender dragonÂ§f to Â§linstantly perch,Â§r no matter where the dragon is, removing those long last few minutes in every average speedrun.

A very... interesting, but useful item for Â§bspeedrunning.Â§f
Upon right-clicking Â§cÂ§o(in the nether),Â§r all nearby piglin within a Â§l100 blockÂ§r Â§lradius Â§r(excluding named and baby piglin) will be teleported Â§ltowards theÂ§r Â§lplayerÂ§r (directly if the player is shifting).
I know, it sounds stupid, but Â§ltrust me...Â§r when you can't find any Â§6piglin,Â§fÂ§o this item can be very useful.

Another goofy, but useful item for Â§bspeedrunning.Â§f
Upon right-clicking Â§cÂ§o(in the nether),Â§r this item will Â§lteleport the playerÂ§r to the Â§enearest blaze spawner,Â§r completely getting rid of the need to locate a Â§cnether fortress.

Upon right-clicking, this item will Â§lteleport the playerÂ§r to the Â§9surface of theÂ§f Â§9worldÂ§rÂ§o (or the highest available air block near or on the surface).Â§r
Especially useful when underground or in caves with no exit.

A Â§lvery powerfulÂ§r item, especially when playing on Â§cÂ§lDoom Mode.Â§r
Upon right-clicking, all nearby Â§7raider entitiesÂ§f (vindicators, evokers, ravagers, pillagers, etc.) within a Â§l300 block radiusÂ§r will be killed, and all Â§9witchesÂ§r will be Â§lteleported directly towards the player.Â§r
To use this item, you must be holding a Â§etotem of undying,Â§f and upon use, the player will be deducted their Â§cÂ§lmaximum health.

Found only in loot chests, the Â§bspeedrunner bulkÂ§r is a very powerful food item that gives Â§6fire resistanceÂ§r and Â§9water breathing,Â§r and also has a chance to give Â§bspeed, Â§ehaste,Â§r and Â§cregenerationÂ§r when eaten.

Crafted with Â§b2 speedrunner ingotsÂ§r and Â§b4 speedrunner planks,Â§r the Â§bÂ§lSpeedrunner's WorkbenchÂ§r acts just like a smithing table, but is also the block that the Â§bRetired Speedrunner villager professionÂ§f uses.
You can also use this block to Â§5transfer enchantmentsÂ§f to other items!

The Â§bÂ§lRetired SpeedrunnerÂ§r is a new villager profession, whom offers some very overpowered trades, for very cheap prices, such as Â§5over-maxed out enchanted books,Â§e golden apples,Â§b speedrunner mod items,Â§f and more!

Crafted from Â§68 gold nuggetsÂ§r and the respective food item, these powerful foods give the player Â§lmore saturationÂ§r and Â§lhungerÂ§r than it's respective parent food would.
To read about more features, refer to the buttons below.
The Â§bspeedrunner armorÂ§r acts almost like iron armor, but slightly more powerful. It applies more protection and has more durability, and can be crafted just like any other armor piece would, using Â§bspeedrunner ingots.
This is basically an upgrade for the normal Â§6golden armor.Â§r It has more durability than normal gold, it's faster than normal gold, and it can Â§lkeep you safe from piglin.
Â§bSpeedrunner bootsÂ§r (or Â§6golden speedrunner boots)Â§r can be worn by the player, giving infinite speed, and protects the player from sensing off Â§bsculk sensor blocks.

A Â§overy powerful weapon,Â§r used against the Â§dÂ§lender dragon,Â§r which will instantly kill it in Â§lone hit.Â§r
Â§oDon't try it on Â§cÂ§oDoom Mode,Â§rÂ§o though...

A new enchantment, which can be found in various different Â§bloot chestsÂ§f and via Â§6piglin bartering,Â§r this enchantment will give the player the Â§bÂ§lSpeed effect,Â§r with it's amplifier being multiplied for each level of the enchantment (max level = Â§l3,Â§r only applicable on boots).

A new enchantment, which can also be found in various different Â§bloot chests,Â§r this enchantment decreases the cooldown time on certain items, such as Â§9ender pearls,Â§d chorus fruit,Â§f andÂ§7 shields.

A new weapon that can Â§lone-shotÂ§rÂ§7 wither skeletons,Â§f and will give them a Â§l100%Â§r Â§lchanceÂ§r to drop a Â§7wither skeleton skullÂ§f upon Â§cdeath.Â§r
To craft Â§7wither bones,Â§r you will need two Â§lnormal bonesÂ§r and two pieces of Â§7coal.
speedrunnermod.features.ores_and_worldge: A new Â§abiome,Â§f which will will generate pretty commonly throughout the overworld. A Â§lgreat placeÂ§r for Â§bspeedrunning,Â§r because mobs spawn less (except for Â§denderman),Â§f Â§bdiamondsÂ§f and Â§9lapisÂ§f generate more commonly, and big amounts of Â§bspeedrunner treesÂ§r generate.

Found across Â§lall biomesÂ§r in the Â§aoverworldÂ§f and in Â§cthe nether,Â§f the Â§bspeedrunner oresÂ§f will drop Â§bspeedrunner ingots,Â§r which can be used to craft all of the speedrunner tools, blocks, and armor, and can be found more commonly in the Â§bÂ§lSpeedrunner's WastelandÂ§r biome.

Found across Â§lall biomesÂ§r in the Â§aoverworldÂ§f and in Â§cthe nether,Â§f the Â§aexperience oresÂ§f will simply drop a Â§lbunch of experienceÂ§r when mined.
The Â§aamount of experience droppedÂ§f can be increased with the Â§5fortune enchantment.
Found in the Â§bÂ§lSpeedrunner's Wasteland biomeÂ§r and in Â§cthe nether,Â§r the Â§7igneous oresÂ§r will drop Â§l2-5Â§rÂ§7 igneous rocks,Â§r which can be used to craft obsidian.

Certain ores, including Â§bdiamondsÂ§f and Â§9lapisÂ§f will generate more commonly all throughout the overworld.
Â§bSpeedrunner ores, diamond ores, Â§aexperience oresÂ§f and Â§9lapisÂ§r will all generate even Â§omoreÂ§r commonly in the Â§bÂ§lSpeedrunner's Wasteland biome.

Structures of almost all types, including Â§6villages, Â§cnether fortresses, Â§7bastions, Â§6buried treasures, Â§1shipwrecks, Â§cruined portals, Â§dend cities, Â§6desert pyramids, Â§7pillager outposts, Â§ajungle temples Â§fand Â§6woodland mansionsÂ§f will generate more commonly!
Â§o The spawn rate of these structures can be configured in the Â§bÂ§ospeedrunner mod options menu.

Â§cNether fortressesÂ§f are much smaller now, and contain more than Â§eÂ§l2 Â§eblaze spawnersÂ§f per fortress.
Â§7Treasure bastionsÂ§f will now generate with a Â§eblaze spawnerÂ§r at the bottom, instead of a Â§6magma cubeÂ§f spawner.
Additionally, Â§bstrongholdsÂ§r are much smaller, each containing more than Â§l1 portal roomÂ§r per stronghold.
This should make navigating these structures much easier!
speedrunnermod.features.doom_mode.basics: Doom mode is a special hard-coded mode, which makes the game extremely difficult to beat. Mobs have more health, speed, and do more damage. Â§lEverything elseÂ§r does basically double damage, and upon entering the end, not only will an Â§dEnder DragonÂ§r spawn, but along with a Â§7witherÂ§r and a Â§agiant.
speedrunnermod.features.doom_mode.bosses: When the end fight begins, the Â§dender dragonÂ§r will spawn like normal, but with Â§cquintupleÂ§r the amount of health. A Â§7witherÂ§r will also spawn, with almost double the amount of health. All withers also regenerate extremely fast. And finally, a Â§aÂ§lgiantÂ§r will spawn. In vanilla Minecraft, the Â§agiantÂ§r does not have any AI. However, this mode Â§lgives itÂ§r a function.
The Â§aÂ§lGiantÂ§r will target anything in it's path, and slowly regenerate at all times. It cannot be killed from the void. If it gets knocked into the void, it will simply teleport back to the middle of the end island. Once the giant reaches half health, ranged weapons are no good. The giant will also randomly spawn Â§cÂ§lTNTÂ§r around itself when taking damage, so watch out for that. The giant is completely immune to explosives, fall damage, fire and lava damage. Good luck with this boss. Â§a>:)
speedrunnermod.features.doom_mode.doom_b: The doom blocks will generate in the end, and if broken, they will spawn various hostile mobs, along with some lava. You can avoid these things if you break these blocks with a speedrunner or golden speedrunner tool. However, they will also drop a variety of helpful items to make the end fight a little bit easier, including armor, crossbows, etc.
speedrunnermod.features.doom_mode.other_: Â§cHostile mobsÂ§r inflict the player with Â§7slownessÂ§r when attacking, and skeletons shoot Â§9slowness arrows. Ghasts shoot Â§9fireballsÂ§r at an extremely fast rate, right-clicking a Â§acreeperÂ§r with a flint and steel will make it Â§linstantly explode,Â§r end crystals do more damage, Â§9ender pearlsÂ§r give Â§lblindnessÂ§r upon use, Â§aender eyesÂ§f will always break, Â§lstrongholds are extremely large,Â§f and generate close to the bottom of the world. Â§cÂ§oIf you're up for the challenge, I wish you luck.
speedrunnermod.features.more.reset_key.t:
Automatically create a new world, on the easiest difficulty, within the press of a button!
Default key = Â§lR.Â§r
You can set this to whatever you'd like in the Â§l"Controls"Â§r options menu, and configure the Â§bfast world creation settingsÂ§r in the Â§bspeedrunner mod options menu.
speedrunnermod.features.more.fog_key.tex:
Automatically enable/disable Â§aÂ§lMinecraft's fogÂ§r with the press of a button!
Default key = Â§lH.Â§r
You can change this to whatever you'd like in the Â§l"Controls"Â§r menu.
speedrunnermod.features.more.fullbright_:
Instantly set your brightness to 1000% to see in the dark areas.
Default key is Â§lO.Â§r
You can change this to whatever you'd like in the Â§l"Controls"Â§r menu.
speedrunnermod.features.more.faster_bloc:
A Â§lbunch of blocksÂ§r can be broken faster now, including Â§6wood, Â§7stone, Â§bores, Â§cnetherrack, Â§7end stone,Â§f and Â§lmuch more!Â§r
Â§oThis can be disabled or increased in the Â§bÂ§ospeedrunner mod options menu.
speedrunnermod.features.more.icarus_mode:
Give yourself a Â§ahead startÂ§f in Â§bevery speedrunÂ§f with an Â§7Â§lunbreakable elytraÂ§r and a Â§lstackÂ§r of Â§cÂ§lfirework rockets!Â§r
You can enable this mode in the Â§bspeedrunner mod options menu.
speedrunnermod.features.more.infini_pear:
Give yourself an Â§9ender pearlÂ§f that does Â§lno damageÂ§r and Â§blasts forever.Â§r
You can enable this mode in the Â§bspeedrunner mod options menu.
speedrunnermod.features.more.piglin_bart:
Â§6Piglin barteringÂ§f is now Â§lEXTREMELY overpowered.Â§r
Â§9 Ender pearlsÂ§r are much more common, along with string, Â§egolden apples, Â§bspeedrunner ingots, Â§6wood,Â§f and much more!
speedrunnermod.features.more.piglin_pork:
When Â§6piglinÂ§f (or Â§6piglin brutes)Â§r are killed, they will drop a Â§enew food item,Â§f called Â§6Â§l"Piglin Pork"!Â§r
It's basically just an alternative for Â§eporkchop...
speedrunnermod.features.more.no_more_pig:
Screw these guys...
Â§6Piglin brutesÂ§f will Â§lno longer spawnÂ§r in Â§7bastions!Â§r
Â§cÂ§oUnless you're on doom mode...
speedrunnermod.features.more.tripled_dro:
Basically Â§aeverythingÂ§f drops Â§lx3 moreÂ§r of what it would normally drop.
This includes Â§aexperience from ores and mobs,Â§f Â§1mob drops,Â§f and more!
speedrunnermod.features.more.nether_port: Â§dNether portalsÂ§f can now be built with Â§7obsidianÂ§fÂ§o and Â§5crying obsidian!
speedrunnermod.features.more.cooked_fles: Â§6Rotten fleshÂ§f can now be cooked into Â§ecooked flesh,Â§f which restores Â§lway more hungerÂ§r than Â§6rotten fleshÂ§f does, and doesn't give the Â§2hunger effect.
speedrunnermod.features.more.fireproof_i:
Certain items are now Â§6fireproof!Â§f
By default, this includes Â§eblaze rods, blaze powder,Â§f and Â§6fire charges.
speedrunnermod.features.more.buffed_loot:
Almost Â§lall loot tablesÂ§r have been buffed to be Â§lextremely overpoweredÂ§r.
This includes Â§7bastion chests, Â§6village chests, Â§cnether fortress chests, Â§bburied treasures, Â§fand Â§lmuch more!
speedrunnermod.features.more.blaze_spawn: Â§6Magma cube spawners Â§fin bastions have been replaced with Â§eblaze spawners, Â§fbecause how are Â§6magma cubes Â§fgoing to benefit you in Â§bspeedrunning?
speedrunnermod.features.more.blazes_drop: When a Â§eblaze Â§fdies, they will have a chance to drop a few Â§egold blocks, Â§fand/or Â§6fire charges.
speedrunnermod.features.more.better_vill:
Not only is the Â§bÂ§lRetired SpeedrunnerÂ§r extremely overpowered, but normal villagers are too!
Â§lAll villager tradesÂ§r have been changed, with lower prices and better items, for Â§oevery villager profession!
speedrunnermod.features.more.throwable_f:
Â§6FireballsÂ§f can be thrown!
Like in Â§cbedwars...
speedrunnermod.features.more.better_deat:
The Â§cdeath screen nowÂ§f displays the Â§lexact coordinatesÂ§f of where the player died, and also sends a chat message to the player.
Additionally, the Â§atextÂ§f on the Â§cdeath screenÂ§f has been Â§lchanged,Â§r to fit the theme of Â§bspeedrunning.
speedrunnermod.features.more.better_anvi:
Â§7AnvilsÂ§f have been Â§bimproved...Â§fÂ§o a lot.Â§r
Say goodbye to that annoying Â§l"Too Expensive!"Â§r feature! Now, you can combine Â§5items/add enchantmentsÂ§f to Â§lany item,Â§r and never have a cost limit.
What's even better is, you can Â§bcapÂ§r the cost in the Â§bspeedrunner mod optionsÂ§f Â§bmenu,Â§f so the cost for Â§lany anvil usageÂ§r will Â§onotÂ§r go over the capped number.
Â§lFinally,Â§r you can go over Â§lmaximum enchant levelÂ§r for Â§5any enchantment.Â§f This means if you have Â§5two sharpness 5 books,Â§f you can combine the books to get Â§dÂ§lSharpness 6.
speedrunnermod.features.more.totems_work:
Free-fall into the void with a Â§etotem of undyingÂ§f equipped, and you will be Â§dteleportedÂ§f to the Â§lcenter of the end island!Â§r
At the cost of your Â§etotem,Â§f obviously...
speedrunnermod.features.more.never_break:
Â§aEnder eyesÂ§r Â§lnever break!Â§r
Â§oUnless you're on Â§cÂ§oDoom Mode,Â§rÂ§o then they will break Â§cÂ§oevery time.
speedrunnermod.features.more.reverse_cra: You can "reverse craft" certain things, including turning Â§lwoolÂ§r back into Â§lstring,Â§r and Â§6sticksÂ§f back into Â§6planks.
speedrunnermod.features.more.less_fall_d:
Players take less Â§cfall damage!Â§f
Additionally, if you Â§lshiftÂ§r while falling, you will take Â§l~0.25%Â§r Â§olessÂ§r damage!
You can also disable fall damage Â§lentirelyÂ§r in the Â§bspeedrunner mod optionsÂ§f Â§bmenuÂ§r (followed by Â§lkenetic damage,Â§r the damage taken when flying into walls with an Â§7elytraÂ§f).
speedrunnermod.features.more.better_hotk:
Turning on Â§eÂ§lhitboxesÂ§r and Â§eÂ§lchunk bordersÂ§r are much easier now, as each now has their own Â§lsingular keybind!Â§r
You can set these keybinds to whatever you'd like in the Â§l"Controls"Â§r menu.
speedrunnermod.features.more.arrows_expl:
Shoot an arrow at a Â§lbedÂ§r and watch it explode!
Â§o(This can be disabled in the Â§bÂ§ospeedrunner mod options menu).
speedrunnermod.features.more.speedrunner:
The Â§l"Java Edition"Â§r text has been replaced with Â§bÂ§l"Speedrunner Edition"!Â§r
(Thanks to Â§6MannyQUESOÂ§f for the texture).
speedrunnermod.features.more.more_experi: Â§aMobsÂ§f and Â§boresÂ§f will drop more experience based on if the player has the Â§bÂ§llootingÂ§r or Â§dÂ§lfortuneÂ§r enchantment on their weapon/tool.
speedrunnermod.features.more.custom_pano:
The Â§bmodÂ§f comes with a new built-in panorama!
You can disable the custom panorama in the speedrunner mod options.
speedrunnermod.features.more.more.text:
Â§aÂ§lCongratulations!Â§r You are now an official Â§bSpeedrunner Mod pro,Â§r and you know about all of it's Â§amain features!Â§r
For more info, refer to Â§l"Learn More..."Â§r button below, or go back and re-read some things if you didn't fully understand everything!
speedrunnermod.features.tooltip: Learn everything that the mod has to offer!
speedrunnermod.title.resources.mods.sodi: A mod that improves the frame rate and fixes graphical issues.
speedrunnermod.title.resources.mods.lith: Another mod that improves the games performance.
speedrunnermod.title.resources.mods.phos: A mod that saves CPU usage and optimizes Minecraft's lightning engine.
speedrunnermod.title.resources.mods.kryp: A mod that optimizes Minecraft's networking stack.
speedrunnermod.title.resources.mods.simp: A mod that adds various different keybinds to the game, often more simple to use than the vanilla ones.
speedrunnermod.title.resources.mods.opti: This mod is Â§cÂ§lNOTÂ§r compatible with Â§lOptiFine.
Learn the different types of bastions, and how to navigate them.
Learn how to properly navigate through nether fortresses.
Learn how to find structures through walls.
Learn how to "blind travel" to the nearest stronghold.
Learn how to kill the ender dragon in one cycle.
Learn how to use the "pie chart" to find nearby structures.
Learn how to locate a buried treasure without a map!
Check out this video by "Penny" to learn some more.
speedrunnermod.menu.title_screen.externa: Learn some more about this mod.
speedrunnermod.discord.tooltip: Become a part of the Speedrunner Mod community, and get notified of new updates, sneak peaks, and more!
speedrunnermod.questions_and_issues.tool: Fill out this form to answer any questions or address any issues you may be having with the mod.

speedrunnermod.doom_mode_screen.line2: I don't think you understand what you're doing.
speedrunnermod.doom_mode_screen.line3: Okay, fine. You want to understand Â§cDoom Mode?
speedrunnermod.doom_mode_screen.line5: The end fight... well good luck with that.
speedrunnermod.doom_mode_screen.line6: But most importantly... expect the unexpected.
speedrunnermod.doom_mode_screen.line8: There's nothing else to it, so beat it!
speedrunnermod.doom_mode_screen.line10: Ok fine, you want to know all the secrets?
speedrunnermod.doom_mode_screen.line11: A giant and a wither spawn in the end.
speedrunnermod.doom_mode_screen.line12: They all have an extremely high amount of health, including the ender dragon.
speedrunnermod.doom_mode_screen.line13: So... I suggest you get the maximum amount of protection you can get.
speedrunnermod.doom_mode_screen.line14: Oh yeah, ender eyes always break and ender pearls give blindness.
